package main

import (
	"embed"
	"html/template"
)

//go:embed admin/*.gohtml
var adminFS embed.FS

var adminTemplates = template.Must(template.ParseFS(adminFS, "admin/*.gohtml"))

//go:embed public/*.gohtml
var publicFS embed.FS

var publicTemplates = template.Must(template.ParseFS(publicFS, "public/*.gohtml"))

-- admin/view.gohtml --
Admin Page

{{define "GET /admin"}}{{template "view.gohtml"}}{{end}}

package main

import (
	"net/http"
	"net/http/httptest"
	"testing"
)

func TestPublic(t *testing.T) {
	req := httptest.NewRequest(http.MethodGet, "/public", nil)
	rec := httptest.NewRecorder()
	mux := http.NewServeMux()
	TemplateRoutes(mux, nil)
	mux.ServeHTTP(rec, req)
	if exp, got := http.StatusOK, rec.Result().StatusCode; got != exp  {
		t.Errorf("expected %d got %d", exp, got)
	}
}
